articles.title: Former Tesla president discloses the secret to scaling a company
articles.description: “We scaled Tesla in 30 months from $2 billion in revenue to $20 billion in revenue,” said Jon McNeil, who is now co-founder and CEO of DVx Ventures.
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: Why Cartken pivoted its focus from last-mile delivery to industrial robots
articles.description: Cartken started seeing an influx of demand for its last-mile delivery robots from industrial customers and is now focused on that sector.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: Tesla loses its charm for India’s loyalists — even as Musk finally delivers
articles.description: Tesla's debut in India has not convinced its early backers, who waited for the company to enter the market for nearly a decade.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh
